scripts.dev: npm run copy && node local_modules/delete-assets.js && vite --host
scripts.build: npm run compile && vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build --mode lib
scripts.build:docs: npm run compile && npm run copy && vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build
scripts.compile:sass: sass assets/sass/main.scss assets/css/style.min.css --style=compressed && sass assets/sass/core.scss assets/css/core.min.css --style=compressed && sass assets/sass/components:assets/css/components --style=compressed
scripts.compile:js: rollup --environment BUNDLE:true --config rollup.config.js --sourcemap && terser --compress passes=2 --mangle --comments "/^!/" --source-map "content=assets/js/scripts.bundle.js.map,includeSources,url=scripts.bundle.min.js.map" --output assets/js/scripts.bundle.min.js assets/js/scripts.bundle.js
scripts.compile: npm run compile:sass && npm run compile:ts && npm run compile:js
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run dev" "serve" "npm run watch:sass" "node local_modules/sass.js" "npm run watch:ts"
scripts.copy:svg: copyfiles -u 2 assets/svg/**/* public/svg && copyfiles -u 2 assets/svg/icons.svg public/svg && copyfiles -u 2 assets/svg/logo.svg public/svg
scripts.copy:img: copyfiles -u 2 assets/img/* public/img && copyfiles -u 2 assets/img/**/* public/img && copyfiles -u 2 assets/img/**/**/* public/img
scripts.copy:css: copyfiles -u 2 assets/css/**/* public/assets/css && copyfiles -u 2 assets/css/* public/assets/css
scripts.copy: npm run copy:svg && npm run copy:img && npm run copy:fonts && npm run copy:icons && npm run copy:css && npm run copy:js
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:scss
scripts.pull-request: npm run test && npm run compile && npm run audit
scripts.deploy:svg: copyfiles -u 2 assets/svg/icons.svg public/svg && copyfiles -u 2 assets/svg/logo.svg public/svg
